38832259.review: A fantastic game that's best played cooperatively. There are several game modes which include VS Arena, Wave Survival, Campaign Missions, and Randomly Generated Missions. It's definitely challenging and requires quite a bit of skill and patience.

38351319.review: Das Spiel ist eigentlich echt gut und macht auch echt spaß, aber seit einiger zeit ist es so, dass ich nur ein schwarzen Bildschirm habe, wenn ich es starte.  Selbst wenn ich es neu installiere bleibt der schwarze bildschirm vorhanden.

38127947.review:
In Angry Arrows, you take upon the role of Legolas who has to battle hordes of Uruk-hai to rescue Princess Zelda from the Legend of Zelda series in an alternate timeline in which she no longer wears a dress and has brown hair. Despite no longer being blonde, Zelda has gotten significantly more stupid: the alternate dimension has stripped her of her Triforce of Wisdom, leaving her with only two apparent skills: getting kidnapped and catching arrows with her face.

In this timeline, the wizard Saruman has improved the Uruks originally created by Sauron: he made them green and also very good at shooting long bows. Also, he invented suicide bomber spiders or something; he can do that, he's a wizard, you know.

Anyways, in this quest to rescue Princess Zelda twenty-five times, Legolas can rescue Zelda alone or with up to three other companions: Link, Hawkeye, or Red the Green Arrow on the same machine with local co-op. However, Legolas works alone, which is why I worked through the campaign by myself without any other person's help. And no other reason.

Besides rescuing Princess Zelda, you can also play as Garrett that guy from Thief and be in a sneaky forest in a randomly generated time trials kind of game thing, or you can also play as some guy who fights orcs in a gladitorial arena. As with the campaign mode, these other modes can also be played with others in local co-op, although Garrett and this hypothetical gladiator also work alone in their lore, which is also why I opted to not receive assistance in these modes. And for no other reason.

There is also a deathmatch PvP mode, but, as I have mastered this game, I thought it would be unsporting to decimate the competition. Therefore, I have not played deathmatch for this reason. And for no other reason.

In terms of gameplay, the most succinct way to describe this game is simply try playing Hotline Miami with a controller, but then also you have to use a bow instead of a machine gun or shotgun. Also, instead of having a 80s bee bop soundtrack like Hotline Miami, this game has a much more soothing soundtrack in campaign mode while you scream obscenities at your computer for being a ♥♥♥♥ing piece of absolute♥♥♥♥♥♥for not ♥♥♥♥ing reading your ♥♥♥♥ing inputs ♥♥♥♥ this game cheats so much ♥♥♥♥ everything broke♥♥♥♥♥game 10/10 would put disk in blender if it was on a disk.

Also, the game is less than the price of a sandwich from Subway. I mean, I don't know what else you would do with $5 if you had it, but you certainly couldn't buy a footlong from Subway. That's how cheap this game is: it costs less than a sandwich.

Also, the system requirements are a bit high, and the 13 whole MB it takes up on my hard drive is a little bit excessive. Had to uninstall GTA V and overclock my i7 in order to support this massive game.

10/10 would not recommend to people concurrently in anger management therapy.

38026553.review: 很有趣的小游戏，对得起这个价，难度略高但很让人上瘾，十分推荐有闲钱的人购买

37892396.review:
中文名：愤怒之箭，这是一个比较冷门的小游戏，而且还挺好玩的。

里面的npc经常会自己走着走着就踩到地雷；一前一后俩人想射我，结果后面那个射中前面那个的屁股，直接弄死了队友。

人质（公主？）的ai也是很智障，如果你跑得比较快，拉出好大一片距离，其中没有任何阻挡，那么公主就会沿着直线向你走去。这时候，路上有一颗地雷...恭喜你，这关你得重打一遍。

当然了，这游戏的难度也是不小的，游戏里你可以根据拉弓（长按按键）时间的长短决定射出的距离，并且弓箭是一发死，对敌对己都是一发死，所以经常会出现对撸结果同归于尽，或者别人打中你你却完全没射到对方的尴尬局面。
这里面有四五种弓箭，你解锁使用一种之后，npc也会换上这种弓箭，当你后期解锁穿透箭时，这下好了，npc不仅能射死队友了，还能把你给弄死，一换一不亏。

哦对了还有“随缘箭”，射出去是往旁边飞的，你甚至可以跟敌人对撸，比谁脸黑被打中。

36030616.review:
有难度，有打击感，上瘾性强，是一款非常好的，适合各年龄段开黑的游戏。

所以，强烈建议支持在线联机，至少销量会高很多！

35076593.review:
I played through the entire game 3-player co-op in a single sitting.  This was a lot more fun than I expected!  The levels are challenging and nearly all of them take multiple attempts to complete.  There's a campaign of 25 levels, plus and endless mode, procedural-generated levels mode, and a player vs player mode.  The campaign is definitely the best aspect, but the other modes are pretty fun too.

Your goal is to release a prisoner on each level and escort the prisoner to the exit.  This objective can be brutally difficult to accomplish, but it's loads of fun!  Guards and exploding spider robots patrol the levels, and they have fantastic aim.  You'll need to dodge often to avoid their attacks, then quickly aim to kill them before they shoot again.  Friendly fire is possible, and we actually had quite a bit of enjoyment from accidentally shooting each other in every single level.  Sometimes your friends just get in the way.  Fortunately you respawn after 3 seconds, and you only lose if all players are dead simultaneously (or if the prisoner is killed).

The game recommends using a controller, but keyboard and mouse makes aiming so much easier (movement is a bit harder).

I do not recommend playing solo.  More players is definitely better.  Not only will the difficulty on solo be (nearly) impossibly difficult, it's just way more fun to play with people.

34963168.review: Very difficult and strategy based game. Every level feels like a puzzle, and every time I die I get more angry. Will definitely try this one with friends.

34943576.review: It's a fun game, But it gets repetitive after a while. And too bad there is no online multiplayer.

34424880.review:
Excellent little co-op gem.

Be warned, this game is ridiculously difficuly solo. Once you get shot, or blown up, that's it, back to the start of the level. But never fear, bring along a friend to server as an ally and convenient re-spawn point. Once you're playing co-op, things are a little too easy... at first. Later levels, and challenge modes, are much, much harder.

If you're looking for some zen Live Die Repeat action, go ahead and play this solo. Want to annoy the heck out of your friends by shooting them in the back and grabbing all of the gold? Go ahead, it's got that too.

Either way, this little game is a ton of fun, for you. and up to three friends.

33576910.review:
This game was frustrating, rage inducing, madness but a total blast. It's up to 4 player local co-op. I played with my 8 year old son and we had a great time beating all the campaign levels. It was a tough challenge when your enemies have perfect aim and you die with one hit. Thing is that your enemies do too and you can use them against each other when they step into the crossfire of other enemies. 

We went through 25 levels in the campaign where you need to kill the enemies until you kill one who drops a key to unlock a prison where your "princess" is waiting to be rescued and taken to the exit. You have one basic enemy who will shoot arrows back at you and then you have a crap bomb that will chase you down and explode. On top of those you have land mines and exploding barrels. When enemies die you get money that you can use to unlock 4 different types of arrows. When you use a different arrow the enemy will use the same one so take that into account.

There are 3 other modes to play through that will add more replayability and challenge. There's Gladiator mode which is a survival style mode where you fight through waves of enemies and each wave it adds more enemies, Rogue mode is a timed mode where you need to get the key, kill all the enemies, save the princess and get to the exit in time. You can gain a little more time with the enemies you kill. Each level is randomly generated so it gives you a lot to play through. The last mode is Arena where you just fight your friends. We didn't try it since it was just the two of us but with 4 players I bet it could be a blast,

At $5 this game is well worth the money. I highly recommend giving it a go specially if you have some friends to do some local co-op.

33174108.review:

33157402.review: Extremely fun little game, especially with friends. I can tell why it's name Angry Arrows, the NPCs do not miss.

33052392.review:
조금 했습니다.

게임 사고 한번도 안해봐서 자기전에 어떤게임인지 맛만 보려고 잠깐 했는데 진짜 재밌네요.
같이 할 사람있으면  사서 하세요. 게임도 얼마 안하니 사는거 추천드립니다. 
게임에 대한 모드도 많습니다. 캠페인모드, 글라디에이터모드(무한대로 웨이브가 나오는 모드입니다.), 아레나모드, 로그모드(이건 안해봐서 뭔지 잘...)등등...
저렴한데 게임은 알차고 풍성합니다.

게임 난이도는 어려운편입니다.
혼자하시면 키보드 마우스로 하세요.(키보드 마우스로 할 시 난이도가 확 낮아집니다.)
근데 저격화살로 움직이는 적 맞췄을때 오는 패드 진동은 게임을 더 재밌게 합니다.

그리고 게임하다보면 돈이 나오는데 그 돈을 모아서 화살 이펙트를 구입 하실 수 있습니다. 화살중에 파티화살이라고 있는데 화살맞으면 폭죽처럼 펑 터지는데 재밌네요.

-32비트게임이라서 그런지 풀스크린으로 하고 하면 화면이 안나오네요.
윈도우모드로 플레이하시길 권장합니다.

------------------------8.22 추가작성------------------------------------

친구랑 둘이 해봤는데 너무 재밌네요.
게임도 간단하고 쉬워서 웃으면서 재밌게 플레이했어요.
근데 스테이지 오를때마다 그냥 맵 구조만 바뀌다보니 조금 쉽게 질리긴 합니다.
가성비 괜찮습니다. 대신 같이 할 친구가 있다면요.

----------------

32487434.review: Rewelacyjna gra, Zarówno solo, jak i w koopeacji. Trudna, ale bez przesady (choć późniejsze etapy przechodzi się raczej po kilka razy). Głupie, ale upierdliwe AI i wrednie porozkładane miny i pułapki. Zabawa w każdym razie jest przednia. Polecam 9/10

32034992.review:
Tight game mechanics, simplicity, difficult and challenging enemies and level design, you'd think all this would lend the game to being a stiff and demanding arcade percision shooter, but combine all this with multiplayer couch-co-op elements it makes for a grand ol' time. The heavy demands that would be set on you as a single player are lightened and turn the campaign mode into a cooperative strategic shooter that's high intestity but forgiving in the long run (thank god for 10 second respawns).

Definitely buy if you're looking for a fun and simple local co-op. Even the battle modes are a good time, (try filling the entire map with mines then set them all off at once)

31930007.review:
Well what a fun game this is :) ! 
note: I only just played this multiplayer , campaign against AI with my 9 year old daughter.
What is it about ?
You start on the map, have to shoot the bad guys, get a key and release a girl from a prison (with that key). Then you have to guide her to a certain point on the map the level is clear.
* Respawn! You only lose if both of you are dead. But if one of you is dead, you respawn next to your friend after a few seconds. Thats great!
* The opponents play pretty hard, they almost never miss. And thats what I like about the game! You have to think and develop tactics to win.
* Since it is rather difficult to hit a bad guy, you are really happy when you do :)!
* You can really improve your shooting (after playing for 15 minutes, you already see much improvement)

It is not easy, but do-able and a really fun local co-op multiplayer, glad I discovered this!

31344165.review: i dont do reviews very often but this game warrents it. fantastic game. super easy to play but very difficult to master. id like to see it expand. just a touch of RPG like some skill trees with individual special skills would be awesome. more game modes. the basic mechanics are spot on though. i can easily see this becomming my groups new party game.

31171479.review: 我建议不要用手柄玩，因为不能全方位瞄准，不过用手柄的话打击感很强，这都是因人而异了。游戏只可以在一台电脑上联机，steam邀请不了好友，所以慎重购买。这是一个半rougelike类的游戏，死了就没了。有一个rogue模式就是随机生成地图罢了，武器角色关卡模式都不会变，所以我叫这个模式为  随机性射箭。游戏操作方法非常简单，也就翻滚与射箭还有移动。不过这简单的键位却隐藏着大大的杀机。手残党要是来玩的话，不是半死就是不活。游戏道具很单一，似乎只有增加时间的。场景互动还好，可以射死鸟，以及射爆油桶。至今我玩了这款游戏，我甚至都不知道那个地上爬的会爆的蜘蛛是啥生物，如果我觉得是机器人的话，我红警玩多了。。。

28873310.review:
困难，而又令人入迷。——年底独自一人玩游戏的Toz.

Angry Arrows 是一款像素风格的射击游戏，并且支持多人[spoiler]互殴[/spoiler]游戏。在游戏中，玩家将扮演一位除了射箭和翻滚外啥都不会的脆皮弓箭手，不同于其它的射击游戏，该游戏中只要被击中一次便会死亡。游戏高度考验玩家的游戏技巧和反应速度。游戏中的敌人只有两种，但敌人一但多起来还是很难对付的。游戏难度略高，不过只要多试几遍还是可以通关的。
该游戏目前有三种模式：
1、剧情（？）模式
老套的救人质，如果人质或所有玩家死亡即失败。
2、Rogue模式
类似剧情模式，只是地图是随机生成的且有通关时间限制。
3、竞技场模式
在竞技场中活下来，每波的敌人数量会越来越多。

游戏总体上来说没有太大的毛病。但是当剧情模式通关后玩家可能会对游戏丧失兴趣（个人认为加入创意工坊可以解决这个问题）。并且Rogue模式可有可无，即使地图是随机生成的，由于游戏的玩法较为单调因而与剧情模式没有太大差别。

这款游戏没有中文，不过并不影响游戏。

23653899.review:
[h1]6.21更新[/h1]
      今天玩儿了会儿有点新的心得了 简单说就是当做类潜行要想办法阴敌人[spoiler]找时机从敌人背后射箭，勾引敌人到有利地形，利用有时候箭的射程比屏幕一半要远什么的~[/spoiler]就会好打很多 结果一路打到24关被猛地打脸  好几组每组四人的不会巡逻不会转向只会射你的弓箭手简直要老命啊 只能射一发立马躲墙后面苟一下再出去射 一个不小心就被射死了 完全没有阴敌人只有被敌人阴的份啊！（大概是我太菜或者又是个需要跑不适合硬肛的关，过两天研究出来再更新。。


[h1]之前的评测[/h1]
      包货IndieGala Hump Day #19 Bundle 这包现在淘宝价格大概6块左右 同包里还有[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/223470/]POSTAL 2[/url]，[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/428410/] PRiO[/url]（跟本游戏同开发商的手残慎入型跳台游戏）等12个游戏 拿来做喜加一可惜了 值得一试（手残慎入） 目前战役模式只打到第五关特地先来写个评测 以后如果有了别的想法再来补好啦

      最重要的一点说在最前面！如果只是自己一个人玩儿的话[code]千万不要按游戏推荐的去使用手柄！！键鼠大法好！！[/code]这游戏挺考验反应速度的 用手柄瞄准本身就比较慢很容易操作失误然后受到伤害！而这游戏又是受伤即死就得重开的类型！所以自己一个人玩儿的话 一定要用键鼠！！我之前用手柄第三关死了20多回硬是没过去！[strike]其实就是菜[/strike] 换键鼠一次过好吗！鼠标瞄准那个顺手大家应该都懂！

      [b]比较难[/b] 这游戏敌人视野非常远 只要没有遮蔽物挡着 基本在屏幕以内都能看见你并且开始攻击，目前碰见的敌人只有弓箭手跟自爆蜘蛛，自爆蜘蛛速度很快 基本不要想逃掉 被发现了立马给它射杀是比较好的做法 弓箭手拉弓速度基本跟玩家控制角色差不多 而且这AI射箭有预判的！如果他射出之前你突然往一个方向翻滚了 他会往那个方向偏离点射出 所以如果对方先拉弓了就赶紧连续翻滚或者找掩体 如果对方晚拉弓就跟他肛！（以上简易攻略仅适用于单挑敌人的时候）

      如果是被好几个敌人同时发现的话难度立马飙升 尤其是一个自爆蜘蛛在附近 远处又有弓箭手拉弓的时候 [spoiler]我他妈到底是躲还是射啊[/spoiler] 所以这游戏走位跟大局观也很重要，尤其是找时机在敌人背对你的时候将其射杀跟如何只让特定敌人发现你好进入单挑节奏之类的~

      另外这游戏敌人之间是有友军伤害的 经常看见后面一个弓箭手一发射死了前面在瞄准我的弓箭手233 利用走位引诱弓箭手踩地雷也可以~不过这游戏ai追人的路径设定有点智障 有时候不会绕远路去找门而是跟你一墙之隔强行原地踏步

暂定8/10 如果想看更专业的评测大家可以移步[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/R_Masamune/recommended/390890/]结城偶像的评测[/url]

23596767.review: 游戏战役模式一共有25个关卡，其实除了最后一关都不是太难。第25关可以考虑绕道地图顶端超视距猥琐过。此外还有竞技场模式和随机地图模式，大大增加了游戏时间。我不算太手残吧，25关用了4h通过，竞技场只坚持到第8波。总体来说还是很好玩的，操控感很好。千万不要满地图乱滚，踩到地雷就233了。看介绍视频，貌似有基友可以续命？那刷竞技场应该就方便多了。

22883710.review:
Rewelacyjny symulator mordowania ludzi za pomocą łuku. Pixelowa grafika nadaje mu old-schoolowego tonu. Trafienia dają ogromną satysfakcję. Kampania dla pojedynczego gracza jest wymagająca, ale porażki bardziej zachęcają do dalszego próbowania niż zniechęcają, co przy tego typu grach jest niezwykle ważne. Tryb "Arena" hartuje ducha jeszcze bardziej, gdy dookoła Ciebie skrada się dwudziestu przeciwników na raz. Tryby dla wielu graczy również dostarczają dużo zabawy.

Jedyne, do czego można się przyczepić, to niestety mała różnorodność przeciwników oraz brak muzyki, aczkolwiek ten drugi zarzut można łatwo obalić, gdy w grze słyszymy każde napięcie łuku, lot strzały oraz finalne trafienie w cel.

Krótko mówiąc: przyjemna, niezobowiązująca rozrywka o niekiedy dość wysokim poziomie trudności.

P.S. Polecamy fanom filmu "Musimy porozmawiać o Kevinie", kto widział, zrozumie... ;)

22309720.review:
非常にシンプルなアクションゲーム。
コントローラーで一人でプレイしましたが、正直なんじゃこりゃというくらい難しかった。とにかく、敵の弓が非常に正確で、打ち損じれば即死確実……それに爆弾が容赦なく迫ってくる……。ですが、慣れてくるとこのシビアさがよい緊張感を生んでいると思いました。うまく矢が決まった時は爽快感があります。
個人的には、協力プレイが一番楽しい。復活もあり、フレンドリーファイアもあり、あーだこーだ言いながら非常に盛り上がりました。連帯感なんかも芽生えます。ローカルしかありませんが、友人とプレイするには最適な作品だと思います。

여분의 마우스와 키보드 및 컨트롤러가 있다면 충분히 2인부터 4인까지 놀 수 있다.

난이도가 상당한편이라 혼자하기엔 너무 어렵다. 중간세이브도 없고 일격필살이라..
친구와 할때 한놈은 미끼역할을 충실히 해줘야 클리어를 할 수 있다.
친구가 말을 듣지않으면 쏴버려라. 죽일 수 있다. 뭐라하면 실수라고 둘러대면 그만아니겠는가?

사실 그런저런 이유보다도 제일 짜증나면서 어려운건 적CPU의 조준사격에 있는데 
플레이어인 내가 구르거나 이동하다 잠깐 멈춘 사이에 바로 쏴버린다.
게임특성상 장애물의 윗부분이나 가려져서 보이지않는곳까지 뚫고 맞춰버리는 것 같다.

이게 그 [b]알파고[/b]인가 뭔가 하는 그거냐?

21134743.review:
[h1]"Tiny archers are arrowing the hell out of you"[/h1]
Neat roguelike shooter. Instead of guns you play oldschool weapons (bow&arrows). Quite interesting mechanics like charging the bow lets the arrow fly longer. Absolutely challenging AI (OK sometimes they trip on the mines). 4 gamemodes. 25 levels campaign. Just the gladiator arena is almost unbeatable. Upgradeable arrow types, local coop and a thrilling soundtrack. Amazing!

21127840.review:
Angry Arrows is a small game made by independent developer Daniel Davis. You play as an archer who is sent to enemy camp where hostage is held, to kill all hostiles and save the [strike]princess[/strike] captive.

Controls are made with focus on being precise, and the game reacts properly, without any delay. You can move, roll and shoot (to any selected direction). Controls reminds me of another indie game, Titan Souls (though there you could use only one arrow, Angry Arrows allows you to spam as many arrows as you want).

Difficulty of the game is set pretty high and requires a patient player. If you can get angry and tilted pretty fast, this isn't a worthwhile pick for you. There aren't any checkpoints, each level (though they are not long) requires to be beaten without dying. There aren't any lives - one shot, one kill, and that applies to both player and the enemy NPCs.

But the NPCs aren't everything to make your playthrough harder, there are also mines, explosive barrels and, mainly, fast annoying spider mines. They like to jump on your head, but trust me, you won't like it.

There are four modes in the game - campaign (25 levels), endless arena, rogue (procedurally generated levels) and multiplayer arena. Game as a whole is perfectly polished (for a cheap game made by yet unknown developer), everything works great - responsiveness, menu screens, gamepad compatibility.

[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]
Angry Arrows is a great game for those who want to play something small but difficult, and is also great example many poor indie developers should check, as they could learn something about making the cheap game polished (say hello to Digital Homicide).

21034249.review:
This game is one of the more skillfull games I've ever played. Here, let me sum up what happens.

*Buy game
*Install said game
*Wonder why it's called Angry Arrows
*Start single player
*Walk around, not knowing what lies ahead
*Sees goblin thing
*Realizes why it's called Angry Arrows
*Play the same mission over and over for practice
*Rage
*Quit game
*Come back to it a while later
*Realize you've gotten better
*Try to beat mission 4
*Rage-quit
*Come back after a week or so
*Realize you have bought a Hidden Gem

I love this game, but sometimes I wonder why spiders have mines surgically implanted to their... well, everything.

20675151.review:
I'll keep this short and sweet; if you are looking for local multiplayer games, get this. It is one of the best local multiplayer experiences I have had on PC, and I have tried MANY local multiplayer PC games.

Besides that, there's not much else to say - what you see in the trailer is exactly what you get. It's a ton of fun, offers multiple game modes (both cooperative and competitive), and is easy to pick up yet difficult to master. Absolutely wonderful, this game is a hidden gem and should be far far far more popular than it is. This game is a steal at its current price.

20389323.review:
游戏的质量非常高，尽管看起来游戏里面的元素并不算多，只有敌我双方和陷阱的简单设定，每一关的任务就是把敌方的大部分敌兵给清光，拿到钥匙解救一个女（的/朋友？）就可以过关了

我一直觉得射箭游戏比单纯的射击游戏更为吸引人，原因在于弓箭的一击必杀性以及对射击精度要求高等等的原因，就像射击游戏里里狙击和步枪泾渭分明一样，遇敌后一瞬间的反应，决定了谁能活下来，这个游戏在这一点上做得不错

战役（关卡）模式多达25关，虽然难度递增并不是很科学，有时候会被一关卡很久，但过了特别难的一关后可能会有很大的进步（玩到了第24关后，才发现前面的关卡都好简单....）。因为游戏没有检查点这个设定（CheckPoint），所以必须一命通关，这就保证了每一个敌人都要认真对待，前进的每一步都要查看死角（当然前期没这么难啦）。

敌人则设计了普通的弓箭手和自爆小（机器人？），特别是后者，颜色和背景色很是相近，一不留神往前冲就会被光速抱脸KaBoom，被它追杀的时候着急放不出箭的滋味真的很让人兴奋....游戏也要灵活运用闪避功能才能玩的下去，比如掌握吸引对方攻击后闪避回击之类的操作，当然先发制人也是可以的，不过要是射不中又躲得不够快的话……这个游戏通关无望了...

游戏的细节方面也非常实在，跑动拉弓破风的声音都很真实，而且双方对射时箭矢相击的话会有一个小角度的偏差，这个细节简直太棒了（看我的侧滚闪避帅不..哎箭怎么转弯了！啊！！！）

看到一个评测说这是个多人合作游戏，但我觉得单人游戏才是体验游戏精髓的方法，多人游戏的难度在关卡模式下大大减少了，但合作也是游戏的一大乐趣嘛，还可以在对决模式里双人对战哦。不过即使没有朋友的话，一个人玩也是完全没有问题的~~

19778297.review:
测评 From Eric:

这个游戏太好玩，已经和朋友玩上瘾了。

这是个主打本地合作的2D闯关游戏，目标是控制你的小人用弓箭杀光敌人救出犯人。（当然还有PVP模式hhh）

特点：
-场景里所有的互动物体都是可以被玩家或者AI控制的敌人触发的。
-友军伤害！！！！（和朋友玩起来太欢乐了）
-关卡难度高，暂时只玩到第七关
-AI的准头太好，不躲一定被射中，但几个会玩的朋友一起玩还是无压力的。
-像素风

9.5/10

19573806.review:
Quick, smooth, solid gameplay. 
Loving it

19476012.review:
又是一款本地合作游戏。
不过我要说，这款其实素质比今天评测的其他游戏都要好一点。
首先说说游戏系统吧，如同标题一样，这是一个射箭的游戏。射箭蓄力过程中不能动，用左摇杆瞄准方向。还有一个翻滚键，目测就这两个内容。
游戏有四个模式：战役模式，无尽模式，随机地图模式和对战模式，最多支持四人coop或者对战。
手感很舒服，拉弓蓄力的timing给人感觉很到位。AI不智障，每局虽然只有有限数量的敌人，但其准头还是很不错。当然也可能是我操作差啦233.
整体的UI流畅，音效颇为经典（我特别好奇这哥们从哪里弄来的，跪求给我也来一份）
战役地图虽然就打了两关多（因为感觉有点难卡了），但是做的应该算是比较用心的。地形和AI站位之类的都还好。
随机地图模式则给了游戏更多生命力。
另外重点要提的就是这游戏有队友伤害，无论敌我都有。这就增加了其作为本地coop游戏的有趣程度。
画面像素风，不是重点所以做的很简单。
总的来说是款良心作，值得一试，适合和水平较高的游戏伙伴一同玩耍，否则你会想摔手柄。
总评：7.6/10
基础分：5.5分 基本完善的小型本地合作游戏
+1 射箭系统的制作
+1 丰富的模式以及随机地图系统
+0.3 逼真的音效2333
-0.2 没有BGM

18901895.review:
This game is awesome but it has small issues that should be added in the future: It should be compatible with all controller types. (I have a logitec and it doesnt work even with Xpadder), It could have more things in the stare, like bows, cloaks, and special abilities, and it could definitely have an easy feature for the people that aren't very good at games like this (IM NOT ONE OF THEM). But overall, this game has lots of potential. And, if the creator of this game got a small group of people with his smarts, he coult definetally make amazing games that could probably take over minecraft. If you took this kind of game and made it like survival (chopping down trees and hunting and such) I would pay at least 20 bux for it. But if you do that game, please make it free (I have limited money for games). Thank you developer for making this great game.

PS: I was wondering what kind of software this game was made with. I love trying to maybe get good at making games, and learning is one of my favorite things. I was hoping to be able to make a game kind of like this, because of its simplicity and complexibility.

18176680.review:
Angry Arrows е игра, която без проблем ще задържи вниманието ви за известно време.
За съжаление най-големият и проблем е липсата на съдържание и разнообразие. На практика имате два типа врагове, срещу които се изправяте. Наред с това предлаганите ъпгрейди на стрелите са ограничени на брой, и за добро или лошо, ако използвате някой от новите видове стрели, то и вашите врагове също ще използват тях.
Angry Arrows във всички случаи не е лоша игра, за това и не мога да и дам отрицателна оценка – няма да е справедливо, но за съжаление липсва като цяло разнообразие.

18162876.review: Игруха крутая! Особенно на 4 геймпада. Одному конечно сложно поначалу, потом привыкаешь и начинаешь щелкать уровни как орешки=) Свою цену игра оправдывает на 100%. Море фана обеспечено!

Very good replayability.

Has arrows.

18039080.review:
I've enjoyed my time playing this.

You see an opponent then they see you and it's on to see who can shoot who first. It's a really adrenaline/jumpy kind of game. It borders on challenging and frustrating. Getting shot is shocking, when spider mines run towards you you're packing it as you have one shot to get them. (Two if you're quick and can land the dodge)

You can roll, hide behind walls and lure enemies by shooting arrows near them. Or lure them onto a mine if you're canny.
It's a short game with loads of potential to expand. It's currently local player only - no multiplayer.

7/10.

18037988.review: This game is very fun and yet very challenging and a blast to play with friends. The unique system and satisfaction of the arrows makes it very enjoyable. My only complaints are that the game is one sided and quite repetitive right off the batt. I would recommend to play it with friends and ignore the frustration of the single player mode.

18031852.review: This game is a great top down strategy. It's line of sight and distance driven meaning that if you can find the right angles, you can pick people off without ever being threatened. I'm currently on level 11, and it is extremely difficult. Anyone who loves cheap challenges with great playtime payout, this is the one for you.

17610732.review:
キャンペーンをクリアしたのでレビューさせてもらいます。

PVの通り弓で撃ちあうゲームですが、操作が移動、弓を構えて射出、回避の3通りでとてもシンプル。
PAD推奨ですがマウス+キーボードの方が狙いやすく感じました。
敵AIの狙いは完璧で、下手に回避を使うと回避後の硬直で射抜かれたり、複数の敵と打ち合えば蜂の巣にされます。
ただし、理不尽な強さではなく障害物の利用、AIの特性を理解することで攻略しやすくなります。
また矢は一瞬溜めて飛距離を伸ばす必要があり、そのお互いに溜めている間が良い緊張感を出しています。
モードにはストアの説明通り
・キャンペーン　全25ステージで人質を救出する
・グラディエーター　wave制で終わり無く出てくる敵を倒し続ける
・ローグ　自動生成MAPで敵を倒して人質を救出し、新たなMAPへ進みつづける
・アリーナ　対戦（ローカルのみ）
の4つです
クリアして終わりではなくやりこみ要素もしっかり用意してあり、価格以上に楽しめると思います。
ただ残念なのがオンライン対戦に対応してないことです。

17545696.review:
At the time of writing this review this game has only been out for two days.... AND GO!


I can't believe only three people have reviewed this game, I absolutely love it. I never expected a game this simplistic could be so fun and so hard at the same time. The main objective of angry arrows is to kill the enemy who has the key, unlock the cage that has the hostage, and get out safely. Sounds pretty easy right? Absolutely not! One shot will kill you requiring you to think out strategies to take out enemies before they have the chance to hit you, you only have the ability to shoot and roll out of the way of arrows. It has so many good things going for it too. The campaign mode is difficult and requires you to think out strategies instead of charging into battle. The rogue mode randomly generates a level in the forest for you to complete based on a random set of numbers, or a seed. The gladiator mode has you set in an arena facing down increasingly difficult waves of enemies who come your way. The final mode is just a simple versus mode where you and at least one other person fight each other to the death. 

All in all this game is amazing, and for the price it is at you shouldn't even hesitate to buy this game immediatly!

17545056.review:
In Angry Arrows, you take upon the role of Legolas who has to battle hordes of Uruk-hai to rescue Princess Zelda from  the Legend of Zelda series in an alternate timeline in which she no longer wears a dress and has brown hair. Despite no longer being blonde, Zelda has gotten significantly more stupid: the alternate dimension has stripped her of her Triforce of Wisdom, leaving her with only two apparent skills: getting kidnapped and catching arrows with her face.

In this timeline, the wizard Saruman has improved the Uruks originally created by Sauron: he made them green and also very good at shooting long bows. Also, he invented suicide bomber spiders or something; he can do that, he's a wizard, you know.

Anyways, in this quest to rescue Princess Zelda twenty-five times, Legolas can rescue Zelda alone or with up to three other companions: Link, Hawkeye, or Red the Green Arrow on the same machine with local co-op. However, Legolas works alone, which is why I worked through the campaign by myself without any other person's help. And no other reason.

Besides rescuing Princess Zelda, you can also play as Garrett that guy from Thief and be in a sneaky forest in a randomly generated time trials kind of game thing, or you can also play as some guy who fights orcs in a gladitorial arena. As with the campaign mode, these other modes can also be played with others in local co-op, although Garrett and this hypothetical gladiator also work alone in their lore, which is also why I opted to not receive assistance in these modes. And for no other reason.

There is also a deathmatch PvP mode, but, as I have mastered this game, I thought it would be unsporting to decimate the competition. Therefore, I have not played deathmatch for this reason. And for no other reason.

In terms of gameplay, the most succinct way to describe this game is simply try playing Hotline Miami with a controller, but then also you have to use a bow instead of a machine gun or shotgun. Also, instead of having a 80s bee bop soundtrack like Hotline Miami, this game has a much more soothing soundtrack in campaign mode while you scream obscenities at your computer for being a fucking piece of absolute shit for not fucking reading your fucking inputs fuck this game cheats so much fuck everything broke ass game 10/10 would put disk in blender if it was on a disk.

Also, the game is less than the price of a sandwich from Subway. I mean, I don't know what else you would do with $5 if you had it, but you certainly couldn't buy a footlong from Subway. That's how cheap this game is: it costs less than a sandwich.

Also, the system requirements are a bit high, and the 13 whole MB it takes up on my hard drive is a little bit excessive. Had to uninstall GTA V and overclock my i7 in order to support this massive game.

10/10 would not recommend to people concurrently in anger management therapy.

17524016.review:
Singleplayer is okay, but can get frustrating because you have to start the level all over again if one of the enemies shoots you with an arrow. And they almost never miss! The game gets really fun in co-op mode (local only!). If one of the players dies and the other one is still alive, you respawn after five seconds. So you can strategize, like spreading out or one player heads out and the other cowardly hides behind a wall. So in campaign mode you try to reach a hostage and bring him/her to the exit, while not being killed by mines, enemies and robots. Some more enemy types or traps would be cool, though we haven't finished the campaign yet, so maybe there's more than these three types.
There's also a couple of other modes, Gladiator mode (fighting wave after increasing wave of enemies) and Rogue mode, which introduces random seed forests in which you only have a limited time to free a hostage. I did not think these two modes added a whole lot to the game.
Versus mode, however, was great, you can choose between four different types and it adds a lot of replayability.
We played this with two xbox360 controllers and after a bit of practice, the aiming feels precise and fast, so no complains about the controls.
All in all, great co-op game for a low price, recommended!

17522370.review: This is a great game, a little hard but a lot of fun
